titles: The lovers joy and grief, or, A young mans relation, in pittiful fashion. Being from his love hindred, by locks, bolts, and kindred. To the tune of Young men and maids.
author: Parker, Martin, fl. 1674
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke.,
notes: Attributed to Martin Parker by Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
